name: Not the Zs
description:
You stand alone in the middle of nowhere. A spot far away from everything, deep into the desert sounded just like the peace and quiet you needed... But something is off here - In the distance you see dozens of figures steadily walking towards you, your feel a rush of adrenaline and fear.
Get ready to fight for your life!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D, or arrow keys for movement;
  • Use your mouse to aim, left mouse button for shooting;
  • R to reload;
  • Q to change your weapon;
  • ESC to bring up the pause menu;

Gamepad and touchscreen support in development!
